name: Da Varanda #002
description: 1 week, an apartment balcony and a camera. This series of photos is being produced from the balcony of my apartment. For 1 week, I will photograph the life that I can see from up here on the 10th floor. This is the second photo, size 3008 x 2000 px, 240 dpi - ISO 200 | 150mm | f/7,1 | 1/400sec. All will be minted in 100 editions at a low price and after the sale period, those that are not sold will be burned.
